$schema: Project metadata for Reyan Makes portfolio site
$comment: Edit this file to update site content, project info, and settings. The build script generates HTML from this.

siteContent.siteDescription: Reyan Bhattacharjee is a high school maker from Plainsboro, NJ who designs and builds things from go-karts to furniture.

hero.title: Hi, I'm Reyan
hero.subtitle: High School Maker • Builder • Creator
hero.description: I design and build things with my hands. From welded go-karts to custom furniture to structures made from reclaimed materials — I've been making since middle school.

featuredSection.title: Featured Builds
featuredSection.subtitle: My best work showcasing woodworking, welding, and creative problem-solving

timeline.title: My Maker Journey
timeline.subtitle: From lake house forts to welding labs—every stop builds the builder I am.

milestones.title: Senior - Experiments
milestones.description: Took welding, fabrication, and design to the next level. Giving back to community via Eagle Scount and NJIT Summer Architecture keept my 2025 fulfilling

milestones.title: Junior - Builds
milestones.description: Wood working became by defacto passion for 2024. From Custom Bed to Temple construction it was fun 2024

milestones.title: Sophomore - Begining
milestones.description: Prototyped tools, art pieces, and layout studies to sharpen hands-on design instincts.

milestones.title: Freshmen - Foundation
milestones.description: Outdoors, hiking, biking, boating, camping - these were are themes of 2022

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: "I can always cut something off, but I can't add it back on" — that's the cornerstone of both engineering and my life.

I am Reyan Bhattacharjee. I'm a senior at West Windsor-Plainsboro High School South, planning to study Industrial Design or Engineering. I've completed NJIT's Summer Architecture and Portfolio Program and work as a lifeguard and swim instructor. I'm also an Eagle Scout and a maker who believes learning happens best when you build.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: Want to collaborate on a project or just chat about making things?

makers-stuff-go-cart.title: Go-Kart Build
makers-stuff-go-cart.description: Welded together from scrap metal and spare parts. Taught myself MIG welding through YouTube and practice. This project pushed me to learn new skills and problem-solve on the fly.

makers-stuff-furniture-bed.title: Custom Bed Frame
makers-stuff-furniture-bed.description: Loft bed designed and built from scratch to maximize room space. Custom joinery and finishing work.

makers-stuff-furniture-shelf.title: Under-Bed Storage Shelf
makers-stuff-furniture-shelf.description: Custom storage solution built to fit perfectly under the bed frame. Maximizing space efficiency.

makers-stuff-furniture-temple.title: Temple Construction
makers-stuff-furniture-temple.description: Traditional temple construction project showcasing woodworking and carpentry skills. Learning from master craftsmen.

makers-stuff-metal-work.title: Metal Work Projects
makers-stuff-metal-work.description: Hand-crafted knife, axe, and rings. Learning metalworking, grinding, and forging techniques.

makers-stuff-wood-work.title: Woodworking Projects
makers-stuff-wood-work.description: Various woodworking projects exploring different techniques and materials.

makers-stuff-clay.title: Clay Sculptures
makers-stuff-clay.description: Exploring sculptural forms and artistic expression through clay work.

photograph.title: Photography Portfolio
photograph.description: Capturing moments and exploring composition through the lens. Bees, canyons, and motion.

sketching.title: Sketches & Drawings
sketching.description: Design sketches, still life, and imaginative drawings. Building visualization skills.

school.title: School Design Projects
school.description: Design engineering projects from school, including the ball sorter mechanism and other engineering challenges.

njit-hcad-program-prototype.title: NJIT Cave Shed Prototype
njit-hcad-program-prototype.description: Cave shed design prototype from NJIT's HCAD summer architecture program. Complete architectural drawings, blueprints, and perspectives.
